Hm, is it the nvidia driver going crazy with memory allocations? Could try setting TF_CUDA_HOST_MEM_LIMIT_IN_MB to lower value

Also could try using alternative memory allocator for TF:

sudo apt-get install google-perftools
export LD_PRELOAD="/usr/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4"

body:
Hm, is it the nvidia driver going crazy with memory allocations? Could try setting TF_CUDA_HOST_MEM_LIMIT_IN_MB to lower value

Also could try using alternative memory allocator for TF:
```
sudo apt-get install google-perftools
export LD_PRELOAD="/usr/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4" 

```
